publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2047 Irene Oldfather: Opening of North Ayrshire Skate Park—That the Parliament congratulates North Ayrshire Skate Group on the recent opening of North Ayrshire’s first official skate park at Auchenharvie, near Stevenston; notes that the £450,000 facility, called "Revolutions", is the first supervised skate park in the United Kingdom; acknowledges all the hard work of the skate group in raising funds by lobbying the local authority, the Scottish Executive, sportscotland and various charitable organisations for assistance and organising trips to other skate park facilities throughout Scotland to gather ideas and information; welcomes the assistance of North Ayrshire Council and North Ayrshire Leisure in facilitating planning permission, helping with the funding applications and planning the future management of the park; notes that the skate group consists of many young members of the local community; recognises the importance of such a project in encouraging physical activity and enterprise and entrepreneurial skills in the young people involved, and hopes that many Ayrshire youngsters will enjoy the skate park for many years to come.
S2M-2047 Opening of North Ayrshire Skate Park (lodged on 22 November 2004) Donald Gorrie*
